select aa.* from ( select a.insmSeq ,a.insmName ,a.insmOrder ,a.insmGender ,a.insmId ,a.insmEmail ,a.insmPw ,a.insmSoNum ,a.insmPhone ,a.insmDesc ,a.insmDateTimeReg ,a.insmDateTimeEdit ,a.insmUseNY ,a.insmDelNY ,a.insmClmNy ,a.insmZipNum ,a.insmAdr ,a.insmAdrDt
